downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 Retail SDK Components
downloadDescription: This document lists the AX 2012 R3 Retail SDK components for E-Commerce Solution, Enterprise Point of Sale (POS), Modern Point of Sale (POS) [Pre-release], Retail Server, Hardware Station, and Scale-out Deployment.
detailsSection: This document lists the AX 2012 R3 Retail SDK components for E-Commerce Solution, Enterprise Point of Sale (POS), Modern Point of Sale (POS) [Pre-release], Retail Server, Hardware Station, and Scale-out Deployment.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
